tool_description: MailGuard is an api that provides an email validation and verification service. With MailGuard, you can detect and block temporary emails, which are a form of email that is deleted after a period of time. Temporary emails can be used for spam, fraud or abuse, so it is important to avoid them. MailGuard helps you protect your reputation, your security and your privacy by verifying the authenticity of the emails you receive or send. import requests
